sub_title: MSc Biochemical Engineering TU Delft        MEng Chemical Engineering NTUA
summary: As a driven and dedicated professional, I am committed to making a positive impact in the field of Bioprocess Engineering and Environmental Biotechnology. I am continuously seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills, with the ultimate goal of contributing to a sustainable future for society. My dynamic personality, coupled with my enthusiasm and passion for this field, allows me to approach each new challenge with energy and determination. My academic background, work experience, and leadership roles have helped me develop strong time management, leadership, and communication skills, which I apply to all aspects of my work.
